segments.text: I would like the two clothes washed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem.madam.But I think the red sweater is not colorfast.Would you like to have it dry cleaned ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your reminding.Yes , please have it dry cleaned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will bring them to your room tomorrow afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2
